short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spice up your browsing with surprise Rickrolls and add a dash of mischief to your browsing routine!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GetRolled is a fun Chrome extension that injects a bit of randomness into your web browsing experience. With GetRolled, you never know when you might get "Rickrolled" â€“ redirected to the classic Rick Astley's "Never Gonna Give You Up" music video.

Features:

Chaos Mode: Toggle Chaos Mode to introduce randomness into your browsing. When Chaos Mode is enabled, GetRolled will randomly redirect a portion of your web navigation attempts to the iconic Rickroll video, adding an element of surprise and delight to your browsing sessions.
Customizable Chance: Set the likelihood of getting Rickrolled with the customizable chance slider. Adjust the slider to your preferred percentage, and GetRolled will respect your chosen level of mischief.

Sleek and Intuitive: GetRolled comes with a sleek and intuitive user interface, making it easy to toggle Chaos Mode and adjust the redirection chance to your liking.

Effortless Installation: Simply install GetRolled from the Chrome Web Store and start enjoying the unexpected twists and turns of the web with a single click.
Whether you're looking to inject some humor into your browsing or simply enjoy the occasional surprise, GetRolled is the perfect Chrome extension for adding a touch of mischief to your online adventures.
